Sends an SMS to one or more recipients.
Creates a new Text-To-Speech call to a n: Creates a new Text-To-Speech call to a number.
Get information about CNAM, HLR, MNP, RC: Get information about CNAM, HLR, MNP, RCS capabilities and Number formats.
Sends a Rich Communication Services mess: Sends a Rich Communication Services message.
Label: Label
The body of the message to send.
Recipient number(s) of the voice calls.
Text message to be read out.
The phone numbers to look up.
Recipient phone number for the RCS messa: Recipient phone number for the RCS message (e.g., 49176123456789).
The unique ID of your RCS agent. If not: The unique ID of your RCS agent. If not specified, the first RCS-capable sender will be used.
Date/time for delayed dispatch. Format:: Date/time for delayed dispatch. Format: yyyy-mm-dd hh:ii or Unix timestamp.
Alternative channel if RCS is not availa: Alternative channel if RCS is not available. If not specified, fallback is disabled.
Validity period of the RCS in minutes. D: Validity period of the RCS in minutes. Default is 2880 (48 hours).
Label for statistics tracking. Max 100 c: Label for statistics tracking. Max 100 characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@).
Activate click and performance tracking: Activate click and performance tracking for URLs (also enables URL shortener).
Your own ID for this message (used in ca: Your own ID for this message (used in callbacks). Max 64 characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9, .-_@).
Triggers when a new SMS message is recei: Triggers when a new SMS message is received
Optionally limit inbound SMS to this par: Optionally limit inbound SMS to this particular phone number.
